text: Delicious food, and excellent service. A short wait for a table was well worth it. So glad we waited. (10 -15 min)

If I'd read the reviews first I wouldn't have come here but I'm glad I did! The food was very tasty and the staff were attentive. 
It's true that they do not bring an itemised bill which is a little odd but they also charged us correctly. …
